Genetic Engineering of Human DNA is THE MOST DANGEROUS ENDEAVOR HUMANITY COULD POSSIBLY EVER UNDERTAKE. This does not extend to GMOs and I wish people would tale their heads out of their asses about this. There is NOT ONE food crop that humans eat today that resembles the ancestor foods of 12,000 years ago. The most prolific that no one talks about apples. In the U.S. there are 2,500 varieties of apples with 100 used commercially. If apples in every new season were not spliced with apple flowering stock from the previous season, no two seasons of apples from the same tree would taste the the same. Yams are still manipulated in the same way they have been for 12,000 years, olives for 10,000 years. There is no farmed foods that are not in one way or another genetically modified. If we didn’t, humanity would have died out millennia ago.

As to human DNA MANIPULATION will start innocent enough, correcting for various developmental disorders. It will first get dark with selective abortion of “undesirable” traits in unborn children. It will quickly, with in 5 to 10 years, first by the military then by the wealthy designer babies. Babies engineered for specific characteristics. At some point, and soon within the first 15-20 generations, there will be so much divergence from the rich designing babies, there will be millions of people who incompatible mates for anyone else on the planet, they are so unique. Eugenics cold wars WILL flare all over the world. Government funded and the rich will have “Super babies” who as teens will be well aware of just how superior they are and will very likely go to war for dominance, wipe each other out, or wipe out the lessers, the poor who could not afford genetic modification. This is Pandora’s Box Personified. The only tech close to the same league is truly Self Aware, Emotional, A.I.

We are in an era where the race to better tech has outstripped our ability to use Good Judgement, Reason and Logic to truly decide if, just because we can do a thing, should we do that thing?? Government and self absorbed, and yes I’m going there, atheist scientist who believe science for the sake of science is the height of human endeavor, will ignore safe guards or whether we should do a thing. Atheist do believe in a god, science and the human mind. They are hardly true atheists, Humanists perhaps.

This video felt a little scattered, to my taste.


Also, while the fact that we have been manipulating genomes for over 10000 years is a valid and useful point to make, I'd be careful with conflating these kinds of modifications with those being brought about via the use of various molecular biology tools as it is those tools that most folk think of when seeing the label "genetic engineering".


For instance, if you don't consider any and all breeding to be genetic engineering, calling Dr. Borlaug a "pioneer of genetic engineering" would be incorrect. While he was definitely an advocate of these techniques, the amazing work he did was all based on conventional breeding techniques.

Selective breeding and crossing of plant species is not genetic engineering. You don't need to know the genetic structure or directly affect the genes. More accurately, it could be described as phenotype engineering.

There are significant risks associated with genetically modifying an organism and releasing it into the environment - both for the organism itself and the rest of the ecosystem. Those risks were not addressed in this video.
